title: Raytha Theming Configuration
description: Configuration for syncing Liquid templates with a Raytha CMS instance

baseUrl.description: Base URL of the Raytha instance (e.g., http://localhost:5000)

apiKey.description: API key for authenticating with the Raytha API

themeDeveloperName.description: Developer name of the theme in Raytha (must already exist)

autoSync.description: When true, automatically sync templates to Raytha after each render. When false, work locally only.

templates.description: Optional: Override labels or settings for specific templates. Templates are auto-discovered from the liquid/ directory.

label.description: Human-readable label for the template in Raytha (default: auto-generated from filename)

allowAccessForNewContentTypes.description: Whether new content types should have access to this template

templateAccessToModelDefinitions.description: List of content type developer names that can use this template
